subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants interviewed the Mets third-base coach Manny Acta yesterday about the club’s managerial opening. Acta met with General Manager Brian Sabean and other team officials in San Francisco. Sabean also planned to talk to San Diego Padres Manager Bruce Bochy, though no meeting had been set. Acta became the fourth person to interview with the Giants; the others were the San Francisco bench coach, Ron Wotus, the Los Angeles Angels pitching coach, Bud Black, and Lou Piniella.
